info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued July 09 at 3:06PM EDT until July 09 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 467 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA IN MARYLAND THIS WATCH INCLUDES 7 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL MARYLAND ANNE ARUNDEL HOWARD MONTGOMERY PRINCE GEORGES IN SOUTHERN MARYLAND CALVERT CHARLES ST. MARYS IN VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 10 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL VIRGINIA CITY OF FREDERICKSBURG KING GEORGE SPOTSYLVANIA IN NORTHERN VIRGINIA ARLINGTON CITY OF ALEXANDRIA CITY OF FAIRFAX CITY OF FALLS CHURCH FAIRFAX PRINCE WILLIAM STAFFORD THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALEXANDRIA, ANNAPOLIS, ARLINGTON, ARNOLD, ASPEN HILL, BETHESDA, BOWIE, CALIFORNIA, CAMP SPRINGS, CHANTILLY, CHESAPEAKE BEACH, CLINTON, COLLEGE PARK, COLUMBIA, DAHLGREN, DUNKIRK, ELLICOTT CITY, FAIRFAX, FALLS CHURCH, FALMOUTH, FREDERICKSBURG, GAITHERSBURG, GERMANTOWN, GLEN BURNIE, GREENBELT, HERNDON, HUNTINGTOWN, LAUREL, LEXINGTON PARK, LUSBY, MCLEAN, NORTH BEACH, ODENTON, POTOMAC, PRINCE FREDERICK, RESTON, ROCKVILLE, SEVERN, SEVERNA PARK, SILVER SPRING, SOUTH GATE, SPOTSYLVANIA COURTHOUSE, ST. CHARLES, SUITLAND-SILVER HILL, WALDORF, WASHINGTON, AND WOODBRIDGE.
